Function Documentation

SURFIT_EXPORTgrid * surfit::_grid_get (  REAL  startX,
REAL  endX,
REAL  stepX,
REAL  startY,
REAL  endY,
REAL  stepY,
const char *  name = NULL
) 
 

Parameters:
startX X-coordinate of the first node of the grid
endX X-coordinate of the last node of the grid
stepX distance between two neighbour X-nodes
startY Y-coordinate of the first node of the grid
endY Y-coordinate of the last node of the grid
stepY distance between two neighbour Y-nodes
name name for geometry (optional)

SURFIT_EXPORTgrid * surfit::_grid_get_for_task (  task *  tsk,
int  Xnodes,
int  Ynodes,
const char *  name = NULL
) 
 

Returns:
pointer to grid class
Parameters:
name geometry name
Xnodes amount of X-nodes
Ynodes amount of Y-nodes
tsk scattered data-points

REAL  stepX,

const char *  name = NULL

SURFIT_EXPORTgrid * surfit::_grid_load (  const char *  filename,
const char *  gridname,
int  mode
) 
 

Returns:
pointer to grid class
Parameters:
filename filename
gridname grid name
